input.sentences: the ribbons were on display | showing what they were for .
there were signs outside telling us what it could and could n't eat .
output.sentences: It was the day of the county fair, and we were excited to see the ribbons on display.
We were also amazed to see how much a pig we saw loved a baby who hugged him.
We visited the sheep, and were surprised by how smart they are.
Farmer John had brought his Alpaca to show.
It was neat to read the signs telling us about each animal such as what they eat.
